info.title: Adding a test client and a user on the server

abstract.para: You can add a client and a user to test authentication for the FreeRADIUS server. The client is a client of the RADIUS server, such as a wireless access point or switch. The users are added in the /etc/raddb/users configuration file.
The machines that can use the devices of the FreeRADIUS server are defined in the /etc/raddb/clients.conf file. These configuration files are stored on the server where FreeRADIUS is installed.
